name: KILL THEM ALL (Ashk)
description:
Made for Brackeys Game Jam # 3!

The theme was : hOles

Kill the enemies, but each enemy you kill, there is another black hole!

It has multiple endings by the way :D

Hope you enjoy!

And please don't  forget to rate my game for the jam :

https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-3/rate/570754

Good luck to all of the participants ;)

P.S. :Don't forget to play it in full screen!

And the soundtrack is "Riders On The Storm" from "The Doors"!
